skill_description_boost-health: Increase one health point for each improvement obtained.
skill_description_boost-damage: Increase one damage point for each improvement obtained.
skill_description_boost-ranged: Increase the scope of the basic attack by 1.
skill_description_shotgun: Perform a shot with area damage front or behind the hero.
skill_description_spawn-bot: Spawn one Bot and you gain the full control of this new character ingame.
